g.name: Name: Nucleotide excision repair in xeroderma pigmentosum Organism: Homo sapiens
DNA unwinding by XPB and XPD helicases
Legend: UV - Radiation DNA Mutated XP gene Nucleotide lesion Stimulation Ubiquitylation
Step 4 - Gap-filling, DNA synthesis and ligation
Inhibition of UV-DDB when no UV-damage is present. With UV damage, inhibition is lifted
The choice of DNA ligase depends on the DNA polymerase involved in repair synthesis and probably the stage of the cell cycle (Moser et al. 2007).

text.tspan: The choice of DNA ligase depends on the DNA
polymerase involved in repair synthesis and probably
the stage of the cell cycle (Moser et al. 2007).
